cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4233, Student Veterans Counseling Centers Eligibility Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 113 (Tuesday, June 29, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MURPHY of North Carolina:
H.R. 4233.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H3308]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

title: Student Veterans Counseling Centers Eligibility Act
